import React from 'react' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import {Row,Col,Image,ListGroup,Card,Button} from 'react-bootstrap' import Rating from '../components/Rating' import products from '../products' const ProductScreen = ({match}) => { const product = products.find(p => p.id === match.params.id) return ( <> Go Back

{product.name}

 Price: ${product.price} Description: ${product.price} ) } export default ProductScreen
